overview: Horny, young tech CEO, Dante Colle cooks up a plan to boost morale at his mobile app company: a 'Masturbation Station'. His idea of a prescribed wank area at the office is a huge win. Happy employees are supposed to be more productive and creative on the job, and his 'Masturbation Station' quickly turns into a hardcore fucking station, but is any one actually getting any work done? Watch this hilarious, six-scene bareback gay porn from the comedic mind of Steve Cruz, who pokes fun at tech company perks while his 11 hung, hard and horny office studs poke each other in intense, raw fucking.
title: Masturbation Station
